title: Dietary Supplements Verification Program | USP
description: USP prides itself in its Dietary Supplement Verification Program which consists of rigorous testing and auditing to evaluate whether submitted products meet the science-based quality standards of quality, purity, potency, performance and consistency.
cleaned_text: When it comes to dietary supplements, many consumers and healthcare practitioners look for independent oversight from an independent third-party not associated with the manufacturer, and with the necessary expertise to assess quality. The USP Dietary Supplement Verification Program is a voluntary program open to manufacturers of dietary supplement finished products from around the world. Through a rigorous testing and auditing process, USP evaluates voluntarily submitted products against science-based quality standards - including federally recognized USP-NF standards of quality, purity, potency, performance, and consistency - and FDA current good manufacturing practices.
